name: Yacht Duel!
description:
Here are the types of dice you'll be using to customize your gameplay!

Notation: [STRIKE:GUARD:SUPPORT]

  • Attacker, Defender, and Healer:
    • These dice have four sides containing their specialized type along with at least one of the remaining types.
    • Attacker: [4:1:1]
    • Defender: [1:4:1]
    • Healer: [1:1:4]
  • X/Y Mixes:
    • These dice have three parts X, two parts Y, and one part not X and not Y.
    • ATK/DEF Mix: [3:2:1]
    • ATK/LP Mix: [3:1:2]
    • DEF/ATK Mix: [2:3:1]
    • DEF/LP Mix: [1:3:2]
    • LP/ATK Mix: [2:1:3]
    • LP/DEF Mix: [1:2:3]
  • Balanced:
    • This die has equal amounts of all three actions.
    • Balanced: [2:2:2]

CREDITS:

  • Music by Filippo Vicarelli (Filippo Game Audio)
    • Music: “Palm Beach”, from PlayOnLoop.com Licensed under Creative Commons by Attribution 4.0 (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
  • Font is "Press Start 2P" by CodeMan38
    • (https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Press+Start+2P)
  • Sound effects were generated by jsfxr
    • (https://sfxr.me/)
  • Sprites were created by me
